body: No ugly bastard tag? No wonder I fucking hate this.... also note to self: next time I watch Monster Musume, find Papy's bastard kid....
@charlbeef... ... ... ... do you need a therapist cause im concerned
@KaosuKishi well...i mean yes i can't argue with that since im fat but i still have mixed feelings
the guy below the guy under me is a close minded retard
Person bellow me is a moron.

I'm surprised people here are still complaining. If you actually think about it, you guys are no better than the guy in this story. I mean, come on, you guys fap to these drawings, yet you think you still have the right to be angry? The very reason as to why you're even annoyed is because while this fatso got a wife, you guys just sit there alone, fapping to something that's just virtual.

Honestly, I'm happy he's at least nice. True, he'S far from a saint, but all in all, he treated Papi well, unlike most of his kind in Hentai. Being fat isn't synonomous with being evil, and hentai artists need to learn that...
great! the uglier the guy... the hotter it gets!
Fat only works for Girls. Major Turn Off.
@seanbear true
Hey, at least this guy's nice. It's not like a mind break or netorare or anything
I have a sneaking suspicion that the artist isn't too off model from the main guy in this comic.
... what a waste of a good Papi doujin...

The artist is definitely trolling, as evidenced by how sad of a being the main character is.
Maybe they're testing how many people will put up with it?
This would be a good interview question for the artists (below complaints)
ehhhh, another one of these where a fat guy ends up showing up.. why isn't darling here.

Like I'm all for everyone having their own standard for beauty...but come on, this is a fucking porn site. Stereotypical standards can totally apply. No need to be all SJW and say everyone is good looking =/

whats really frustrating is that every fat guy ever, even though 90% of the time in doujins they are ugly as fuck, it gets tagged as BBM...mutha fucka do you realize the second B stands for beautiful right? I've seen some where the fat guy isn't necessarily ugly, so its warrented there. but here? this guy ain't BBM. He's just fat.
Why the hell do they draw it with a fatass tub of lard instead of the main character? Hell, I'd take a blank slate character with a "P" for a face over this shit. Are the artists trolling us?
Want a pig tag too so I can search with -netorare and -pig. Seriously why are they always drawing such ugly fat pigs instead of the main character which we all like, Darling is no exception.
Not hating, but can we get a pig tag
I preferred the main character over that dude. But it was some what good.👍
I know right? ...Well, at least it isn't Netorare. Then again, I can't really enjoy this either, so... Hm.
Aawwww why is it always a pig and never the main character?
